* Iron Raptor looked at her new blue legs as Prowl chuckled at her, finding 
it a bit funny herself. Her laughter rising with his for a moment, smiling 
as she reaches up her hand to take his. But she saw the blush in his cheeks, 
chuckling.*

" I would say so." * But even those words didn't pay the fact no credit, 
Prowl had done something remarkable for her that she doubted could happen 
just often. And she was very proud and very thankful for him.
But Iron Raptor simply smiled as Prowl leaned down to kiss her, though 
seeing him stop when she asked him her question. Suddenly blinking a few 
times as thoughts, not her own, come into her mind.
Prowl...had been jelouse...and then a setting in the spark had gone 
wrong...and then the sparks had detonated.
Iron Raptors eyes snapping up to Prowl, not exactly knowing what to think 
but just nodded at his words.

She then pulled herself up, wabbly on her legs and bracing herself with her 
arms against Prowls chest. Still not quite believing just what she had seen, 
looking at Prowl. Her voice was soft, but a little hurt.*

" You killed us...."

* In her mind, the trust that she had felt as the merge began was gone, she 
perhaps trusted him now, but doubted the trust that she had felt for him 
before.*
